quizlist.question: What should you do in order to deal with a data breach?
quizlist.option3: make sure it wasnâ€™t your fault

quizlist.question: What are core parts of a breaches policy?
quizlist.option1: define what you mean by a breach
quizlist.option2: enforce the penalties associated with critical factors
quizlist.option3: who to blame in case of a breach

quizlist.question: What are core parts of a breaches policy?
quizlist.option1: identity who is responsible for doing what, when and how.
quizlist.option2: avoid non-compliance, error or malicious intrusion
quizlist.option3: document how your risk was zero

quizlist.question: What should you do if a breach occurred?
quizlist.option1: provide a clear data audit trail
quizlist.option2: explain how the breach was an exceptional case and has no impact on any other data releases
